event.title: confirmed instances of the illness so-far this year

data.event: The state as a whole has seen more than 400 confirmed instances of the illness so-far this year.

event.title: took no special precautions during August

data.event: Her staff took no special precautions during August.

event.title: Earlier in the month, Tim Whitley, a city official in Malakoff, told

data.event: Earlier in the month, Tim Whitley, a city official in Malakoff, told Wikinews his city had began using a pesticide specialist to spray twice-weekly.

event.title: this year as result of having contracted

data.event: Twenty-six people have died so-far this year as result of having contracted the virus, approximately half occurring in Texas.
